  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205262</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Challenges in Changing the Face of a City</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herausforderungen, wenn das Gesicht einer Stadt 
geändert wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Défis en changeant le visage d'une ville</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desafios em mudar a cara de uma cidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sfide nel cambiare la faccia di una città</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκλήσεις στην αλλαγή του προσώπου μιας πόλης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desafíos en cambiar la cara de una ciudad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is designed to explore the complex challenges Oakland's Mayor Jerry Brown faces as he attempts to bring change to the city of Oakland. Key issues include housing, poverty, gentrification, politics and business development.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist konzipiert, um die komplizierten 
des Herausforderungen Gesichter des Bürgermeisters Jerry Brown 
Oaklands zu erforschen, während er versucht, Änderung an der Stadt 
von Oakland zu holen. Schlüsselausgaben schließen Gehäuse, 
Armut, gentrification, Politiken und geschäftliche Entwicklung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est conçue pour explorer les visages 
bruns de maire Jerry d'Oakland complexe de défis pendant qu'il 
essaye d'apporter le changement à la ville d'Oakland. Les 
questions clés incluent le logement, la pauvreté, le gentrification,
la politique et le développement des affaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição está projetada explorar as caras do 
mayor Jerry Marrom do Oakland complexo dos desafios enquanto tenta 
trazer a mudança à cidade de Oakland. As edições chaves 
incluem o desenvolvimento da carcaça, da pobreza, do gentrification, 
da política e de negócio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è destinata per esplorare le facce 
del sindaco Jerry Brown de Oakland complessa di sfide mentre tenta di 
portare il cambiamento alla città di Oakland. I punti chiave 
includono lo sviluppo dell'alloggiamento, di povertà, di 
gentrification, di politica e di affari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα έχει ως σκοπό να ερευνήσει τα Brown
του σύνθετου Όουκλαντ προκλήσεων δημάρχου Jerry πρόσωπα 
δεδομένου ότι προσπαθεί να φέρει την αλλαγή στην πόλη του 
Όουκλαντ. Τα βασικά ζητήματα περιλαμβάνουν την κατοικία, 
την ένδεια, το gentrification, την πολιτική και την 
επιχειρησιακή ανάπτυξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se diseña para explorar las caras de
alcalde Jerry Brown de la Oakland compleja de los desafíos mientras 
que él procura traer el cambio a la ciudad de Oakland. Las 
cuestiones claves incluyen el desarrollo de la cubierta, de la 
pobreza, del gentrification, de la política y de negocio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
